name: Flippy Birb
description:
Originally created for Unity's Create With Code learning course, Flippy Birb is an endless Flappy Bird style game. The objective is to fly through port holes and avoid crates floating through a space station. Collect powerups to shield Birb or dart forward to avoid obstacles.

I'm using this project to reintroduce myself to Unity as well as all of the processes that surround game production. It is in no way to be taken as a finished product. If any major bugs arise or I find more features I would like to implement, I will provide updates. Thanks for taking a look.
